entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 7:43 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:43 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 7:43 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
